price: 158. Rabteenik hinnay Qiddimteenik isin inkih Yallih xaqul Cisab kee galtoh maagowsimtan Akeeral.
arabic: وَلَئِن مُّتُّمۡ أَوۡ قُتِلۡتُمۡ لَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
